name: Idle Funeral Tycoon
description:
Idle Funeral Tycoon is an mortician simulator, a game in which you have to make money as well as organize the controls. Show everyone that you are a skillful manager and help your city at the same time! Build your funeral empire and have your coffins ready!
Not a single dead person will be left without a grave: Morticians and their hearses patrol the city! In this game you can:
- Managing the mortuary is no easy task, your morticians should always be ready! It's time to update them, because a funeral home is not just a hearse and a doctor. Spend idle money, invest income to upgrade and build! You can buy equipment rooms and vehicles. Do not forget to level up so workers have the highest quality tools. Every decision you make affects what your strategy is, how you expand, and whether your morgue is up to it. Preparing corpses for burial will be a real adventure! Bury people with dignity!
- Hire employees - every mortician strives for maximum productivity. Good management can help with this: Automate the process and bury everyone! Find out which strategy is the best, show which of you is the manager in this Idle Funeral Tycoon simulator, build an empire. Mortician and manager at the same time! At the same time, this is not a clicker: you do not have to endlessly press the screen, as in other idle simulators.

What will you do?

- Manage the team: as an mortician and as a manager. Bury every resident of the city (military, billionaire, superhero and many others). The new dead? Hearse - go!
- Hearses, coffins, shovels - a real mortician must be technically equipped! When people in town have a new corpse, the hearse is already on its way.
- Improve management: hire managers and improve your business. A city full of corpses is a bad city.
- Build a system: as soon as a new corpse, a hearse, every mortician is ready to bury people.
- Every mission is a challenge! The secret to success is to earn unused money and invest it. If you are a good manager, you can use the earnings and benefits to upgrade the tools and equipment in the rooms!

Idle Funeral Tycoon - Mortician Simulator Manager - Features:
- The more you earn, the better your empire will be
- Bury and do not forget to upgrade your graveyard.
- Upgrade your equipment! The embalming table, the farewell room - all that needs to be built and mission accomplished!
- With this simulation of the mortician you can idly earn money both online and offline! An example of a good economic game! Better than Clicker!

Have you heard that there is a new corpse in town? It's time to send in the hearse and bury a human with dignity! The coffin is ready!
